ibis.io
Class DataInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      ibis.io.DataInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataInput, Closeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BufferedArrayInputStream
public abstract class DataInputStream
extends InputStream
implements DataInput

A general data input stream. Provides for methods to read data from an underlying implementation. Calls to read functions may block until data is available.
